name: The Mall (demo)
description:
Welcome to The Mall

Controls:

  • Move: arrows/WSAD
  • Interact: "A"/Z/Alt
  • "Start": Enter

Move to people or objects and press button to interact (some objects automatically interact upon approaching) walk up onto a bench to sit down! Walk around, explore, take your time, this mall has absolutely no zombies!

Enjoy this demo, new versions will be uploaded when new locations are added or major bogs are found and fixed.

Made with GB Studio, which is a great program I highly recommend.

Current Version

Demo V: 1.0 - 2019.07.03

  • Explore the upper and lower mall hubs, book store, and restrooms!
  • Interact with random folks and objects!
  • Sit on benches!
